===Private Key ===

The private key should contain the following information:
	Sequence
	Version
	Modulus
	Public exponent
	Private exponent
	primes p and q
	exponents 1 and 2, and the coefficient, to help with efficient computation
	potentiall other information about the primes to help with computation

To decode the private key, I copied it into  Lapo Luchini's ASN.1 decoder. The integers found in the private key were the following:

	Version:

		Value: 0

===Public Key===
The public key should contain the following information:
	modulus
	public exponent

To decode the public key, I first converted it into PKCS#1 format and then pasted it into the Michael Holtstrom decoder. That gave the following:

	Modulus:

	Public exponent:
0x010001 (65537 decimal)
